title: permanently suspended
body:
My account with no reason for permanently suspended. I can login in on June and after summer. It was been permanently suspended. I want to unban my account. I have no idea why my account has been permanently suspended.

Once I try to login in and it says"player banned, this account has been permanently suspended. Please check the email address associated with your league of legends account for additional details".

replies.body: It looks like this account was suspended from some pretty suspicious activity that could have been a hacker on your account. We'll be able to respond to that ticket soon if they haven't yet, and that's where you'll be able to get all the finer details on what happened.

There are multiple reasons this could have happened - chargebacks (Riot didn't get the money from your bank for an RP purchase), if someone was trying to hack into your account, etc.

Your best bet is to submit a support ticket and they can give you more detail as to why you were suspended.
Ok. I already submit a support ticket to them. I am so sad that I couldn't login in.
